title: VR-Based Fire Preparedness Simulation Game Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental fire safety awareness and first-aid knowledge
context.additional_context: Fire Response Training Project Using VR Simulations in Smartphone-Centric, Limited-Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform initial response procedures (reporting, evacuation guidance, fire extinguisher use) with 80% accuracy in a VR environment during a fire
Learners can acquire the ability to identify risk areas and plan optimal evacuation routes through fire spread pattern analysis
Learners can develop role distribution and collaboration strategies applicable to real situations through team-based simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
